thread_replies.author: GlÃ¸rd.Sign
thread_replies.text: Just a glimpse and this destructive power... When it's implemented, it'll stir up the sword world again, right? Waiting in seiza for the follow-up.

thread_replies.author: Vindicated Chidi
thread_replies.text:
The visuals of the new Touken Danshi are already building up expectations just from the atmosphere alone, aren't they?  
I'm looking forward to the announcement of the full reveal and implementation date. I'm keeping an eye on further updates for how the world of the work will

thread_replies.author: saint â€
thread_replies.text:
lol at the raging Hasebe Alter comments  
Anraku-giri, maybe... I can also feel a hint of NikkÅ Ichimonji flavor

thread_replies.author: saint â€
thread_replies.text: Naginata straight blade? Banzai music? No way, Hasekura Kunishige's brother, Hasekura Kuninobu's sword, Touhaku Kuninobu? Atsuta Kuninobu? Okubo slasher? Wait a sec, Hasekura, Hasekureeeee!!

thread_replies.author: saint â€
thread_replies.text:
Ataki cut!? Is it the Ataka cut?!?! 
The Oda family's!!! Hassebe's scabbard in this main course!!! 
Is it the Ataka cut!?!! 
The Ataka cut I've been waiting for forever!!!?!

thread_replies.text:

By the way, why can all you Saniwa folks come up with such thorough analyses in just 10 minutes... amazing...

thread_replies.author: é–‹
thread_replies.text:
The new Touken Danshi-kun's chest armor looks like a bowl.  
There was a bowl-shaped helmet, right? The famous one is Kuroda Kanbe's helmet.  
Kuroda Kanbe's swords already include Heshi Cut Heshigiri Nagayoshi and Nikko Ichimonji, so by process of elimination, it's "Anatetsuki."
